//techwiz911
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define pb push_back
#define SZ(a) (int)(a.size())
#define all(a) a.begin(),a.end()
#define gcd __gcd
#define b_c __builtin_popcount
#define mp make_pair
#define in insert
#define er erase
#define fi(i,a,b) for(int i=a;i<b;i++)
#define fd(i,a,b) for(int i=a;i>=b;i--)
#define tr(c,it) for(typeof(c).begin() it=(c).begin();it!=(c).end();it++) 
#define X first
#define Y second
#define init(a,b) memset(a,b,sizeof(a))
#define n_p next_permutation
#define b_s binary_search
#define endl '\n'
#define min(a,b) ((a<b)?a:b)
#define max(a,b) ((a<b)?b:a)
#define INF INT_MAX
#define INFL LLONG_MAX
#define trace1(x)                cerr <<#x<<": "<<x<<endl;
#define trace2(x, y)             cerr <<#x<<": "<<x<<" | "<<#y<<": "<<y<< endl;
#define trace3(x, y, z)          cerr <<#x<<": "<<x<<" | "<<#y<<": "<<y<<" | "<<#z<<": "<<z<<endl;
#define trace4(a, b, c, d)       cerr <<#a<<": "<<a<<" | "<<#b<<": "<<b<<" | "<<#c<<": "<<c<<" | "<<#d<<": "<<d<<endl;
#define trace5(a, b, c, d, e)    cerr <<#a<<": "<<a<<" | "<<#b<<": "<<b<<" | "<<#c<<": "<<c<<" | "<<#d<<": "<<d<<" | "<<#e<<": "<<e<<endl;
#define gc getchar_unlocked

using namespace std;

typedef long long LL;
typedef vector<int> VI;
typedef vector<LL> VLL;
typedef set<int> SI;
typedef set<LL> SLL;
typedef pair<int,int> PII;
typedef pair<LL,LL> PLL;

void FastIO()
{ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);cin.tie(NULL);cout.tie(NULL);cout.precision(15);}
LL modpow(LL a, LL p, LL mod)
{LL ret=1;while(p){if(p&1)ret=(ret*a)%mod;a=(a*a)%mod;p/=2;}return ret%mod;}
LL power(LL a, LL p)
{LL ret=1;while(p){if(p&1)ret=(ret*a);a=(a*a);p/=2;}return ret;}
//Template Ends Here
int ans=0;
int t[20010]={0};

inline int get(int x)
{
    int ret=0;
    while(x>0)
    {
        ret+=t[x];
        x-=(x&-x);
    }
    return ret;
}
inline void upd(int x,int v)
{
    while(x<20010)
    {
        t[x]+=v;
        x+=(x&-x);
    }
}

int s;
inline bool cmp(pair<PII,int> p,pair<PII,int> q)
{
    int x=p.X.X/s,y=q.X.X/s;
    if(x==y)
        return p.X.Y<q.X.Y;
    return x<y;
}

int ret[20010],a[20010],b[20010];
pair<PII,int> query[20010];
int main()
{
    FastIO(); 
    
    s=(int)(sqrt(1.0*20010));
    int x,n,q,l,r,idx;
    cin>>n;
    fi(i,0,n)
    {
        cin>>a[i];
        b[i]=a[i];
    }
    sort(b,b+n);
    fi(i,0,n)
        a[i]=(int)(lower_bound(b,b+n,a[i])-b)+1;
    cin>>q;
    fi(i,0,q)
    {
        cin>>l>>r;
        query[i]=mp(mp(l-1,r-1),i);
    }
    sort(query,query+q,cmp);
    int pl=0,pr=0;
    fi(i,0,q)
    {
        l=query[i].X.X; r=query[i].X.Y; idx=query[i].Y;   
        while(pl<l)
        {
            ans-=get(a[pl]-1);
            upd(a[pl],-1);
            pl++;
        }
        while(pr>r+1)
        {
            ans-=(get(20009)-get(a[pr-1]));
            upd(a[pr-1],-1);
            pr--;
        }
        while(pl>l)
        {
            ans+=get(a[pl-1]-1);
            upd(a[pl-1],1);
            pl--;
        }
        while(pr<=r)
        {
            ans+=(get(20009)-get(a[pr]));
            upd(a[pr],1);
            pr++;
        }
        ret[idx]=ans;
    }
    fi(i,0,q)
        cout<<ret[i]<<endl;
    return 0;
}
